channel.title: Vengeance-X PVP V2 (AKA: Flawlscape V5)
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B][I]Vengeance-X PVP V2 (AKA: Flawlscape V5)[/I][/B] [B]Oh yeah; to get it to run have common sense and fix the location of the cache (Signlink class)[/B]
[B]Features: [/B]
[ul][*]508 Maps [*]660 Items [*]634 Characters [*]New gameframe, bank, friends and ignore list, shop, etc. [*]602 Animations, GFX's, NPC's [*]PVP Economy: Earn your money through PVP [*]3GB VPS [*]Great Hybriding and Switching [*]Curses and New Prayers [*]All Specials on Items Working [*]New Hitmarks with Soaking [*]Dominion Tower [*]Bounty Hunter [*]Low(er) Memory Usage [*]Augury and Rigour[/ul]
[B]Images: [/B] [IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/1120/89932046.png[/img] [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/5974/27061797.png[/img] [IMG]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/601/53170581.png[/img] [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/4107/23510724.png[/img] [IMG]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/7055/ssword.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/818/dragondagger.png/[/img] [IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/5850/dragonclawsd.png[/img] [IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/5999/chaoticmaul.png[/img] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4669/armadylgodswordi.png[/img] [IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/8171/darkbowg.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/714/chaoticcrossbow.png/[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/97ljxx.png[/img]
[B]Download:[/B] [URL=http://uppit.com/scx67prrn118/Vengeance-X_PVP.zip]Download Server + Client + Cache[/URL]
[B]Credits: [/B] - Me - Pasi - Eliminate for his client - Creators of PI/Xyle/Any tutorial or snipper used
[/CENTER]

item.title: Vengeance-X PVP V2 (AKA: Flawlscape V5)
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:14, topic:436286”][quote author=OmgItsShane link=topic=539006.msg3944322#msg3944322 date=1331697110]
If anyone can’t find how to fix the client which is easier than shit here you go.

Search for public static final String findcachedir() { in signlink in the client.

Replace with this

public static final String findcachedir() { String s; String s1; File file; s = "c:/.YOURCLIENTNAME_Cache/"; s1 = ""; file = new File((new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).toString()); if(file.exists() || file.mkdir()) { return (new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).append("/").toString(); } return null; }

tada.

@ Topic: What the hell is up with the server engine?
[/quote]

lol you gave them the code how to fix it tbh its not that hard

on topic
looks good nice job[/quote]
Mopar has alot of people who are beginning and this is a good source and client for them to use to start out so I told them how to fix it.

Read full topic
